"third way"和中文版本的“中間路線”的意思有所差距 建議換一個詞語 再者 third way代表了有第一種和第二種的方式 既然如此 需要解釋另外兩種方式 所以換一個更確切的詞會比較好

第二段

Traditionally, the government is born to tax its people. It governs and uses taxes to...

第三段

其大部分职责交给社会组织和私营公司，自己仅承担外交治安法律经济等最最基础职责


這段原文的中文在英文版沒有出現 我認為這段非常好 應當出現在英文版中 英文版本中的是

the servicing government it is.


跟上文對不上 如果樓主不介意 下文是我寫的版本

...of governance, because the government decentralizes its responsibilities to non-government organizations and private sectors and the government is merely responsible to the very basic duties, such as diplomacy, law enforcement, economics, etc. 

This way requires the fewest employees and lowers its expenditure to the least. This is easy...

提高整个社会的运行效率和降低运行成本，民众才可以获得最大的自由和财富，社会才会稳定。这种小政府模式必定是文明世界才有可能产生的。


Building a efficient and low cost system, the people under the limited government gains the maximum.


這兩段對應的中英文 不完全對得上

我的英文版本：

This way increases the efficiency of the entire government and lowers the operation cost. The people are able to maximize their freedom and wealth, so the society is stable. This kind of small government can only be a result of a civilized society.
